column4: hmm.. somebody know where can i access my localhost folder in ubuntu?
where is the apache htdocs folder hide?
you mean the folder where you store your webpage?
that correct, in /var/www
yes...
but i cannot copy the file into it. i do not have the root permission
try "sudo chmod +rw /var/www/"
i know that i can use the sudo in terminal to copy a file into it.... but i want to open this permission for permanent
that was it... it changes the permission so that it would have both - read and write for user, group and others...
thanks, it work, i sudo chmod 777 /var/www/
thanks you...
it'd be enough to chmod to 666...
ok... i change it to 666
as you dont really need the execute permission...
your names seems so familiar, are you a joomla member?
no... what is joomla?
I see... no I'm not a joomla member...
you a bit wrong le..
if i change to 666, i can't even access any pages.. unless i make it to 777
are you there?
I'm here
but I gotta go...
bye
